page.title: 02The Village
page.content: and breakfast place. On the right there are mainly semi- detatched houses.There is a telephone box oposite the green.There is a pub called The Old Oak Tree.The school is the last building it is about 100 years old.It is only a small school that has 41 pupils and two classrooms. After the roundabout if you go straight on for 100 yards you come to the entrance to Thornborough House Farm which does bed and breakfast.It has a private bridge because of the A19 taking away all the traffic. If you go left at the roundabout you get to Northallerton. North Kilvington is about half a mile north of South Kilvington and there are only four or five houses there.
